channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Pot hole on Friern Park, 28th July
item.description:
There are pot holes around Friern Park near the junction with High Road.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 14, Friern Park, North Finchley, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Vehicle Abandoned, 28th July
item.description:
This vehicle has been parked here for well over 6 weeks and has not moved. It is taking up valuable parking spaces needed for residents and patients at the doctors surgery. Has no valid MOT certificate.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 13, Leechcroft Avenue, Blackfen, Sidcup, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: 2 condoned bikes on either side of Summerhouse Road, 28th July
item.description:
These bikes have been here for more than a year and now only frames left due to theft and distraction. Please remove as soon as you are able to. Thank you.

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Stoke Newington Church Street, Hackney, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Frequent dog fouling on the path, 28th July
item.description:
There are some down owners who are reguarly failing to pick up their dogs' mess on the thames path.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Riverside, Charlton Riverside, London

item.title: Dogs in the toddler play area, 28th July
item.description:
On two occasions people are bringing dogs in to the play area where babies are. Need a sign to ensure dogs arenâ€™t allowed

item.title: Rubbish again outside 24 Hill road., 28th July
item.description:

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Alma Square, St. John's Wood, London

item.title: Pipes and tarpaulin, 28th July
item.description:

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Charlton Park Lane, Charlton, London

item.title: Kerb damaged, 28th July
item.description:
A kerb stone has been damaged by a vehicle. This can be slippery and make walkers slip into the road.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 14, Friern Park, North Finchley, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: 162 Glengall Rd NW6, 28th July
item.description:
The brick wall belonging to the above property which runs along Donaldson Road just before the barriers. This wall is looking extremely unsafe. The wall leans out over the pavement and the brickwork is collapsing. In particular the mortar at the bottom of the wall has crumbled. I worry that it could fall and injure somebody.

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Glengall Road, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Tree roots, 28th July
item.description:
Hello the tree planted outside number one has grown out and is pushing the driveway up causing issues with trip hazards, when we initially reported the issue we included the footpath which has been done but the driveway has been ignored and we have received no correspondence

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 1, Oaklands Avenue, Blackfen, Sidcup, London
Report on FixMyStreet
